title: TIP7 - LON Liquidity Incentive Phase III (LON 流动性激励三期)
body:
**Background**
* According to the Tokenlon litepaper, 10,000,000 LON is reserved for liquidity related incentives.
* The core team has kicked off two LON Liquidity Incentive phases so far, with the current one to end on 2021.3.4. 
* The team plans to start LON Liquidity Incentive Phase III on 2020.3.4. It will last for 8 weeks and end on 2021.4.29. Phase III LON incentive will be rewarded in the same way to the below two liquidity pools:
  * LON/ETH pool on Uniswap
  * LON/USDT pool on Sushiswap

**Goal**
* Let the community decide on the number of LON for Liquidity Incentive Phase III

**Proposed Action Items**
* Make changes based on the voting results of the proposal, and take effect at 2021.3.4 4:00 UTC

**Voting Rules**
* Addresses with more than 0 LON can vote
* Addresses participating liquidity mining phase II can vote (including unclaimed LON reward)
* Addresses with LON LP token can vote
* LON balance snapshot block: 11950550
* Voting start time: 2021.3.1 6:00 UTC
* Voting end time: 2021.3.4 6:00 UTC

**Voting Options**
* A. Each of the two pools receives 300,000 LON as the Phase III Liquidity Incentive
* B. Each of the two pools receives 400,000 LON as the Phase III Liquidity Incentive
* C. Each of the two pools receives 500,000 LON as the Phase III Liquidity Incentive
* D. Each of the two pools receives 600,000 LON as the Phase III Liquidity Incentive
* E. Each of the two pools receives 700,000 LON as the Phase III Liquidity Incentive

---

**背景**
* 根据 Tokenlon litepaper 内容，10,000,000 LON 可被用于流动性相关激励。
* 核心团队已开启两期流动性激励，目前这期将根据计划于 2021.3.4 结束。
* 核心团队计划于 2021.3.4 开启第三期流动性激励，为期 8 周，于 2021.4.29 结束。三期将采用同样的形式激励以下两个流动性池：
  * Uniswap 上的 LON/ETH 池
  * Sushiswap 上的 LON/USDT 池

**目的**
* 由社区投票决定激励力度，开启第三期流动性激励

**提案执行项**
* 根据提案投票结果实施激励，生效时间为 2021.3.4 12:00 PM UTC+8

**投票规则**
* 持有 LON 大于 0 的地址能够参与本次治理投票
* 参与 LON 流动性挖矿的地址能够参与本次治理投票（包含未领取 LON 奖励）
* 持有 LON LP 代币大于 0 的地址能够参与本次治理投票
* LON 持有量快照区块高度：11950550
* 治理投票开启时间：2021.3.1 14:00 UTC+8
* 治理投票结束时间：2021.3.4 14:00 UTC+8

**投票选项**
* A. 两个池分别获得 300,000 LON 作为三期流动性激励
* B. 两个池分别获得 400,000 LON 作为三期流动性激励
* C. 两个池分别获得 500,000 LON 作为三期流动性激励
* D. 两个池分别获得 600,000 LON 作为三期流动性激励
* E. 两个池分别获得 700,000 LON 作为三期流动性激励
author: 0x25A087dC3512e3BE548F0cA13233ae29d3781bdC
